languages.text: "Нет и близко. Корабль это знаете какая роскошь? Реколлигеров со своим кораблем по пальцем одной руки пересчитать — причем руки старого работяги, которому трижды пальцы станком жевало и дважды плазменным резаком полосовало".

"No, not even close. A luxury like that? You could count the recolligers who got their own ship on one hand — an old worker's hand that got sucked into machinery three times and slashed by a plasma cutter twice."
languages.original_text: "Нет и близко. Корабль это знаете какая роскошь? Реколлигеров со своим кораблем по пальцем одной руки пересчитать — причем руки старого работяги, которому трижды пальцы станком жевало и дважды плазменным резаком полосовало".

traits.locale_text: "No, not even close. A luxury like that? You could count the recolligers who got their own ship on one hand — an old worker's hand that got sucked into machinery about three times and slashed by a plasma torch about two times."
traits.speaker: ScavengerLeader

traits.locale_text: "No, not even close. A luxury like that? You could count the recolligers who got their own ship on one hand — an old worker's hand that got sucked into machinery about three times and slashed by a plasma torch about two times."
traits.speaker: ScavengerLeader

traits.locale_text: "No, not even close. A luxury like that? You could count the recolligers who got their own ship on one hand — an old worker's hand that got sucked into machinery three times and slashed by a plasma cutter twice."
traits.speaker: ScavengerLeader

traits.locale_text: "No, not even close. A luxury like that? You could count the recolligers who got their own ship on one hand — an old worker's hand that got sucked into machinery three times and slashed by a plasma cutter twice."
traits.speaker: ScavengerLeader

traits.locale_text: "No, not even close. A luxury like that? You could count the recolligers who got their own ship on one hand — an old worker's hand that got sucked into machinery three times and slashed by a plasma cutter twice."
traits.speaker: ScavengerLeader

languages.text: “没有，根本不可能。像那样的奢侈品哪敢想呢？有自己的飞船的回收专员，只要一只手就能数得过来。而且还是老技工的手，三次被卷进机器里，两次被等离子切割器割了手指。”
languages.original_text: "No, not even close. A luxury like that? You could count the recolligers who got their own ship on one hand — an old worker's hand that got sucked into machinery three times and slashed by a plasma cutter twice."

traits.locale_text: “没有，根本不可能。像那样的奢侈品哪敢想呢？有自己的飞船的回收专员，只要一只手就能数得过来。而且还是老技工的手，三次被卷进机器里，两次被等离子切割器割了手指。”
traits.speaker: ScavengerLeader

languages.text: «No, ni de lejos. Puedes contar los recolectores con un lujo como ese con los dedos de una mano... que se haya metido entre la maquinaria tres veces y se haya cortado otras dos con un soplete de plasma».
languages.original_text: "No, not even close. A luxury like that? You could count the recolligers who got their own ship on one hand — an old worker's hand that got sucked into machinery three times and slashed by a plasma cutter twice."

traits.locale_text: «No, ni de lejos. Puedes contar los recolectores con un lujo como ese con los dedos de una mano... que se haya metido entre la maquinaria tres veces y se haya cortado otras dos con un soplete de plasma».
traits.speaker: ScavengerLeader

languages.text: 「いいえ、まったくもって違います。そんな贅沢とおっしゃいましたか？自分の船を手に入れたレコリガーは片手で数えることができるほどです。それも、機械に3回巻き込まれ、プラズマカッターで2回切られた老いぼれ労働者の手でね」
languages.original_text: "No, not even close. A luxury like that? You could count the recolligers who got their own ship on one hand — an old worker's hand that got sucked into machinery three times and slashed by a plasma cutter twice."

traits.locale_text: 「いいえ、まったくもって違います。そんな贅沢とおっしゃいましたか？自分の船を手に入れたレコリガーは片手で数えることができるほどです。それも、機械に3回巻き込まれ、プラズマカッターで2回切られた老いぼれ労働者の手でね」
traits.speaker: ScavengerLeader

languages.text: "Nein, weit entfernt. So einen Luxus? Recolliger mit eigenem Schiff könnt Ihr an einer Hand abzählen – an der Hand eines alten Arbeiters, die dreimal in eine Maschine und zweimal unter den Plasmaschneider geraten ist."
languages.original_text: "No, not even close. A luxury like that? You could count the recolligers who got their own ship on one hand — an old worker's hand that got sucked into machinery three times and slashed by a plasma cutter twice."

traits.locale_text: "Nein, weit entfernt. So einen Luxus? Recolliger mit eigenem Schiff könnt Ihr an einer Hand abzählen – an der Hand eines alten Arbeiters, die dreimal in eine Maschine und zweimal unter den Plasmaschneider geraten ist."
traits.speaker: ScavengerLeader

languages.text: « Vous rigolez ? On est loin de pouvoir se payer un luxe pareil. Les récupérateurs qui possèdent leur propre vaisseau se comptent sur les doigts d'une main... la main d'un vieil ouvrier happée à plusieurs reprises dans une machine. »
languages.original_text: "No, not even close. A luxury like that? You could count the recolligers who got their own ship on one hand — an old worker's hand that got sucked into machinery three times and slashed by a plasma cutter twice."

traits.locale_text: « Vous rigolez ? On est loin de pouvoir se payer un luxe pareil. Les récupérateurs qui possèdent leur propre vaisseau se comptent sur les doigts d'une main... la main d'un vieil ouvrier happée à plusieurs reprises dans une machine. »
traits.speaker: ScavengerLeader

languages.text: "Yok efendim, ne gezer? Kendi gemisine sahip olan geri dönüşümcülerin sayısı, bir elin parmaklarını geçmez... Tabii bu da ancak o el, üç kez makineye kaptırılıp iki kez plazma kesiciyle kesilmişse."
languages.original_text: "No, not even close. A luxury like that? You could count the recolligers who got their own ship on one hand — an old worker's hand that got sucked into machinery three times and slashed by a plasma cutter twice."
